revised_title: Shape Factors for Beta-Decay: A New Approach
tldr: The authors use the Wigner-Racah algebra and the method of Spiers and Blinstoyle to calculate the shape factor for beta-decay processes. They find that the correct form of interaction in these processes is either a space-time parity (STP) combination or a vector-axial (VA) combination. The study provides a deeper understanding of the behavior of beta-decay processes and helps in determining the correct form of interaction.
